016
017package org.tribuo.data.columnar.processors.field;
018
019import com.oracle.labs.mlrg.olcut.config.Config;
020import com.oracle.labs.mlrg.olcut.provenance.ConfiguredObjectProvenance;
021import com.oracle.labs.mlrg.olcut.provenance.impl.ConfiguredObjectProvenanceImpl;
022import org.tribuo.data.columnar.ColumnarFeature;
023import org.tribuo.data.columnar.FieldProcessor;
024
025import java.util.Collections;
026import java.util.List;
027
028/**
029 * A {@link FieldProcessor} which converts the field name and value into a feature with a value of {@link IdentityProcessor#FEATURE_VALUE}.
030 */
031public class IdentityProcessor implements FieldProcessor {
032
033    /**
034     * The value of the emitted features.
035     */
036    public static final double FEATURE_VALUE = 1.0;
037
038    /**
039     * The name of the field that values will be drawn from.
040     */
041    @Config(mandatory = true,description="The field name to read.")
042    private String fieldName;
043
044    /**
045     * Constructs a field processor which emits a single feature with a specific value
046     * and uses the field name and field value as the feature name.
047     * @param fieldName The field name to read.
048     */
049    public IdentityProcessor(String fieldName) {
050        this.fieldName = fieldName;
051    }
052
053    /**
054     * For olcut.
055     */
056    private IdentityProcessor() {}
057
058    @Override
059    public String getFieldName() {
060        return fieldName;
061    }
062
063    @Override
064    public List<ColumnarFeature> process(String value) {
065        return Collections.singletonList(new ColumnarFeature(fieldName,value,FEATURE_VALUE));
066    }
067
068    @Override
069    public GeneratedFeatureType getFeatureType() {
070        return GeneratedFeatureType.BINARISED_CATEGORICAL;
071    }
072
073    @Override
074    public IdentityProcessor copy(String newFieldName) {
075        return new IdentityProcessor(newFieldName);
076    }
077
078    @Override
079    public String toString() {
080        return "IdentityProcessor(fieldName=" + getFieldName() + ")";
081    }
082
083    @Override
084    public ConfiguredObjectProvenance getProvenance() {
085        return new ConfiguredObjectProvenanceImpl(this,"FieldProcessor");
086    }
087}
